techmeme.title: Bluesky says it added 500K new users in a day this week after X announced plans for controversial changes, including basically getting rid of the block feature (Mia Sato/The Verge)
LinkedIn woos publishers, testing a "News Banner" on its mobile app feed and a video ad program that sources say will earn Bloomberg and WSJ $2M+ each in 2024 (Sahil Patel/The Information)
Verizon will buy some of US Cellular's spectrum licenses for $1B, contingent on closing a deal announced in May to sell some US Cellular assets to T-Mobile (Jake Rudnitsky/Bloomberg)
Nebius Group, previously Yandex NV, says it will resume trading on Nasdaq on October 21, after being halted following Russia's February 2022 invasion of Ukraine (Reuters)
Sources: Microsoft and OpenAI are negotiating how much equity Microsoft gets when OpenAI becomes a for-profit company, for which OpenAI has two years (Wall Street Journal)
